= MongoDB =

== Install ==
* yum install mongodb mongodb-server


== Start&Stop ==
* service mongod start/stop/restart
* systemctl mongod start/stop/restart


== Connect ==
* mongo

== Commands ==
* db
* show dbs
* use xxx
* help

== Insert ==
* j = {name: "mongo"}
* k = {x: 3}
* db.testData.insert(j)
* db.testData.insert(k)

== Query ==
* show collections
* db.testData.find()
